original_title: UFC Fight Night 13: Florian vs. Lauzon
overview: UFC Fight Night 13: Florian vs. Lauzon was a mixed martial arts (MMA) event held by the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC) on April 2, 2008,[3] at the Broomfield Event Center in Broomfield, Colorado, United States.
title: UFC Fight Night 13: Florian vs. Lauzon
